article_title: Watch Cheerios’ heartwarming Super Bowl ad featuring an interracial family
article_text:
Topics: cheerios, Cheerios interracial family, Cheerios interracial family Super Bowl ad, Cheerios Super Bowl ad, super bowl 2014, Super Bowl Cheerios, Super Bowl XLVIII, Video, Media News, Entertainment News, News

Remember in 2013 when internet racists threw a full-blown freak-out over Cheerios’ featuring an interracial family in one of its ads?

Well, Cheerios is rightly not backing down — in fact, the cereal company made a point of including the same family in their ad for this year’s Super Bowl, no small gesture when you consider just how expensive and coveted a Super Bowl ad spot can be.

It’s getting a great response on Twitter, too:

The little girl in the @cheerios ad? Absolutely ADORABLE!! #cheerios #superbowlads — Erica Stone Gilbert (@resplendentlyme) February 3, 2014

As a soon to be #daddy, I really like the #Cheerios commercial. If I have a little girl I could totally see myself giving her a puppy. — Joe Petri (@JoeyPetri) February 3, 2014
